, I've located the third stone. Please meet me in Highwatch.

- Meren

The third stone was with Olivung, on the Island of Dawn.

To your surprise, Olivung had broken the stone into three pieces and was using them to fuel a brazier.

Olivung promised to turn over the stone, but only if you gathered the ingredients he needed.

After a fearsome battle with a Bloodbound Teralith, you were able to get its core, deliver it to Olivung, and retrieve the Aspiration Stone.

, you're here.

I have located the Aspiration Stone. A member of our Banquet Committee has it."Who is it?"

Olivung, our Head Chef.
He's on the Island of Dawn, trying to develop a new dish for the banquet.

How someone could ever cook on the Island of Dawn is a mystery, but Olivung's always been a bit...odd.

While you're retrieving the stone, can you please check on how his recipes are coming?

This teleport scroll should take you right to him.

Meren is looking for me? I'm not done with my new recipes yet.

What? A red stone? Yes! It's right there, in the brazier!

The fire was too hot when I put the whole stone in, so I had to break it up into three pieces!

Thanks to that stone, the temperature is just right! I don't know what I would have done without that stone!"That's actually..."
Hmm. That stone's not much use stuck on some dusty old crown. It's better used here by the world's most renowned chef!<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Just give me the stone."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

What? No!

I just can't bring some ordinary dish to this banquet!

The best food comes from using the best ingredients and tools—including this stone!

My whole reputation is riding on this!"Won't you reconsider?"

Well... I suppose, since the crown is for the goddess...
You’ll have to gather ingredients that have power equivalent to this stone’s heat.

I need materials that can maintain the same temperature that it is now.

But... but I’m only going to give you one piece at a time!
I’m risking my whole career on this!

First, get me a {@linkcreature:13#7004#Bloodbound Teralith} Core.

Good job!

The core is fresh, indeed! Just looking at it makes my mouth water.

Hang on. I'll test its properties by preparing a quick dish."Take your time."

Here you are!

One 'Bloodbound Salad'!

This should whet your appetite!
Try it!
I want every gourmet in the land to experience this treat!

Tasty isn’t it?

I’ve learned that the Bloodbound Teralith Core makes a fine ingredient for an appetizer.

Watching someone enjoy my food is a true pleasure for a chef! "It’s a bit sour..."

Is it? Hm...I might've used the wrong size measuring spoon...

Well, you kept your part of our bargain, so so will I.

Here is the first piece of the stone, like I promised. Let me know when you put it in the crown.
That's the Eternal Crown? Look! It changed a little bit!<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"What do you need next?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

I'm still working on the next recipe...
You'll need to wait until I can finish it.

You need to get stronger to handle the crown anyway, right?

You'll get stronger in no time when I finish this dish!
